thread.title: Birmingham company to launch pedal tours to breweries, bars across the city
thread.title_full: Birmingham company to launch pedal tours to breweries, bars across the city

author: Ivana Hrynkiw | ihrynkiw@al.com
title: Birmingham company to launch pedal tours to breweries, bars across the city
text: The company, Birmingham Pedal Tours, has not announced a launch date but is working with the city to meet proper ordinances. The pedal bike will accommodate 14 people and be equipped with a sound system, rain cover, and electric-assist motor.
